name: Asteroid Dodge (Leaping Games)
description:
Launch into space with this addictive motion rocket game!

Blast off in space with Asteroid Dodge, the addictive motion shuttle game that your friends will want to play, but they can’t! It’s your phone, only you can play it so get them involved.

The goal is to launch your shuttle as high into space and dodge in endless hours of fun. Simple touch controls when you release in your shuttle. Earn in-game score from successful launches.

Easy to play but hard to become the expert in the gameplay means you’ll be coming back again and again for more boosts and eventually become addicted to the play of the game.

How to play: Tap and hold to launch your shuttle into space and do not let go or you will lose the game.

First before you download:
Week make updates every few weeks or even into a month but we will keep you up to date on our Facebook page.
Link to the page: https://www.facebook.com/LeapingGames/

Now go have fun by downloading this game and launching into space.
